Dear ##first_name[Supporter]##,

I am excited to announce that one of the country's most prominent and fearless immigrant-rights activists will be joining us at the conference!

Maru Mora Villalpando is the founder of Northwest Detention Center Resistance and has been battling Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) in the Pacific Northwest for years. She was recently targeted for deportation by the Trump administration after publicly speaking out the agency's cruelty towards immigrants. Maru is an inspirational and courageous civil rights fighter and you won't want to miss her keynote speech!

RSVP now to join us in Salem on June 23! »

The workshops and training sessions at the statewide conference will focus on skill development, issue analysis, and building advocacy strategies to make Oregon a better place for everybody. You'll learn how to effectively push lawmakers, help prepare for ballot measure fights against the anti-immigrant IP 22 and the anti-choice IP 1. We will also offer briefings on district attorney accountability, reproductive justice, homelessness issues, digital privacy, and other important civil rights and civil liberties topics.

Register today! »

Join civil rights and civil liberties supporters from across the state, and come away with inspiration and practical skills to help make your community a better place!

Sincerely,

Jazmine Roque
Statewide Organizer
ACLU of Oregon
